categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Lexa Tcheil was a human Jedi Initiate who served within the Jedi Order just before the outbreak of the Clone Wars. She was among a group of Initiates that were training under Grand Master Yoda until Obi-Wan Kenobi entered the classroom and asked for Yoda's help in searching for Kamino.
